examples.fqsCode:
Simple Example

Hap.py | birth day  to | you - ; |
K&1 cc  | d c f  | e  |
counter: 3
examples.description: First 2 measures of 'Happy birthday to you' in F major in 3/4 time.

examples.fqsCode:
Simple Rhythm Example

* - - - | * - * - | * * * * | ** ** ***  **** |
K0   c | cc | cccc   | cc cc ccc cccc  |
examples.description: Demonstrates whole, half, quarter, eighth,  triplet eighths and sixteenth notes in 4/4 time.
